title: Extract and Analyze Comments from Word Documents
text: Line numbers: Word doesn‚Äôt store true line numbers internally. Line column represents paragraph position, serves reliable reference point. Page numbers: estimated (~25 paragraphs per page) since Word calculates pages render time based fonts/margins. Resolution status: package checks multiple XML files (commentsExtended.xml, commentsExtensible.xml) detect resolved comments across different Word versions.

text: docx_path Path .docx file include_resolved Logical. TRUE (default), includes resolved comments. FALSE, returns unresolved comments.

title: Extract comments from a Word document ‚Äî extract_comments
text: data frame following columns: Text text commented Comment comment content Author Comment author name Date Date time comment made Line Paragraph number document (approximate line reference) Page Estimated page number Resolved Logical indicating comment thread resolved comment_id Internal comment ID para_id Paragraph ID thread matching parent_id Parent paragraph ID (replies)

title: Extract comments from a Word document ‚Äî extract_comments
text: function parses internal XML structure Word documents extract comment data. Line numbers refer paragraph positions since Word store true line numbers. Page numbers estimated based paragraph count (~25 paragraphs per page). Comments returned sorted position (Line) date.

what: Extract and merge comments from multiple document versions ‚Äî extract_comments_multiple
title: Extract and merge comments from multiple document versions ‚Äî extract_comments_multiple
text: Extracts comments multiple versions document (related documents) merges single data frame. Comment IDs renumbered avoid conflicts. output format identical extract_comments, making compatible wordcomments functions.

title: Extract and merge comments from multiple document versions ‚Äî extract_comments_multiple
code: extract_comments_multiple(   docx_paths,   include_resolved = TRUE,   add_source = FALSE )

title: Extract and merge comments from multiple document versions ‚Äî extract_comments_multiple
text: docx_paths Character vector paths .docx files include_resolved Logical. TRUE (default), includes resolved comments. FALSE, returns unresolved comments. add_source Logical. TRUE, adds Source column indicating document comment came . Default FALSE compatibility functions.

title: Extract and merge comments from multiple document versions ‚Äî extract_comments_multiple
text: data frame structure extract_comments: Text text commented Comment comment content Author Comment author name Date Date time comment made Line Paragraph number document Page Estimated page number Resolved Logical indicating comment thread resolved comment_id Internal comment ID (renumbered avoid conflicts) para_id Paragraph ID thread matching (renumbered) parent_id Parent paragraph ID replies (renumbered) Source (Optional) Source document filename, add_source = TRUE

title: Extract and merge comments from multiple document versions ‚Äî extract_comments_multiple
text: function useful multiple reviewers working separate copies document want consolidate comments. Comments sorted Line (position) Date, regardless document came . gives unified view feedback organized appears document. Since comment IDs renumbered, thread relationships (replies) preserved within document across documents.

title: Extract and merge comments from multiple document versions ‚Äî extract_comments_multiple
